text: @GininaTeacup1 @MaryanneChisho2 You need to study epidemiology of viruses.  They cannot live outside of a host for an extended period.  Corona viruses cannot persist on a dry surface.  Your claims are unfounded and unscientific rumors designed to scare people.  That is completely unnecessary.
